title: A New Exit In OpenAI's Growing List Of High-Level Departures
content: OpenAI chief technology officer Mira Murati on Wednesday said she is leaving the company behind ChatGPT.
summary: OpenAI chief technology officer Mira Murati on Wednesday said she is leaving the company behind ChatGPT.

title: Meghan Markle's Ex-Staff Call Her A "Demon Boss" With "Psycho Moments"
content: Former staffers alleged that the 42-year-old royal mistreated employees and often made them feel "like s**t."
summary: Former staffers alleged that the 42-year-old royal mistreated employees and often made them feel "like s**t."

title: Hindu College Expresses Pride In Its Alumna Harini Amarasuriya Becoming Sri Lanka's PM
content: The Hindu College in Delhi has expressed its "immense pride" in its alumna, Harini Amarasuriya, becoming the 16th Prime Minister of Sri Lanka.
summary: The Hindu College in Delhi has expressed its "immense pride" in its alumna, Harini Amarasuriya, becoming the 16th Prime Minister of Sri Lanka.

title: 'Goodbye Meta AI' Scam Dupes Thousands, Including Hollywood Stars
content: Julianne Moore, Sarah Paulson, and James McAvoy are among the celebrities who have shared the post so far, which first gained traction earlier this month.
summary: Julianne Moore, Sarah Paulson, and James McAvoy are among the celebrities who have shared the post so far, which first gained traction earlier this month.

title: Author Jhumpa Lahiri Declines Award Over New York Museum's Keffiyeh Ban
content: Pulitzer Prize winning author Jhumpa Lahiri declined to accept an award from New York City's Noguchi Museum after it fired three employees for wearing keffiyeh head scarves, an emblem of Palestinian solidarity, following an updated dress code.
summary: Pulitzer Prize winning author Jhumpa Lahiri declined to accept an award from New York City's Noguchi Museum after it fired three employees for wearing keffiyeh head scarves, an emblem of Palestinian solidarity, following an updated dress code.

title: 4 Arrested After 'Suicide Pod' Is Used For First Time In Switzerland
content: Swiss police have arrested several people after a controversial futuristic-looking capsule designed to allow its occupant to commit suicide was used for the first time, authorities said on Tuesday.
summary: Swiss police have arrested several people after a controversial futuristic-looking capsule designed to allow its occupant to commit suicide was used for the first time, authorities said on Tuesday.

title: NASA Astronaut Returns To Earth After 78 Million Miles Journey In Space
content: Tracy Dyson spent 184 days in space, completing 2,944 orbits around Earth.
summary: Tracy Dyson spent 184 days in space, completing 2,944 orbits around Earth.

title: Secret Service Agent Probed Over "Sexual Misconduct" Involving Harris Staffer
content: The Secret Service is investigating one of its agents after an incident involving someone in Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris' office, her office said in a statement on Wednesday.
summary: The Secret Service is investigating one of its agents after an incident involving someone in Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris' office, her office said in a statement on Wednesday.

title: Temple Defaced With Anti-Hindu Graffiti In US, Second Time In 8 Days
content: The BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir in California was on Wednesday desecrated with expletive-laden anti-Hindu messages, in the second such incident in the US in as many weeks.
summary: The BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir in California was on Wednesday desecrated with expletive-laden anti-Hindu messages, in the second such incident in the US in as many weeks.

title: Pics: World's First 3D-Printed Hotel Takes Shape In Texas
content: El Cosmico, an existing hotel and campground on the outskirts of the city of Marfa, is building 43 new hotel units and 18 residential homes over 40 acres - all with a 3D printer.
summary: El Cosmico, an existing hotel and campground on the outskirts of the city of Marfa, is building 43 new hotel units and 18 residential homes over 40 acres - all with a 3D printer.

title: New York Mayor Eric Adams Indicted Following Corruption Probe
content: New York City Mayor Eric Adams has been indicted after a federal corruption investigation, but the indictment is sealed and it is unclear what charges he will face, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.
summary: New York City Mayor Eric Adams has been indicted after a federal corruption investigation, but the indictment is sealed and it is unclear what charges he will face, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.

title: Israel Hints At Lebanon Ground Invasion As Joe Biden Warns Of "All Out War"
content: Israel has told its soldiers to prepare for a possible ground operation against Iran-backed Hezbollah in Lebanon as US President Joe Biden warned against "all-out war" in the Middle East.
summary: Israel has told its soldiers to prepare for a possible ground operation against Iran-backed Hezbollah in Lebanon as US President Joe Biden warned against "all-out war" in the Middle East.

title: Nuclear Bomb Can Deflect Life-Threatening Asteroid, Say Scientists
content: Humanity could use a nuclear bomb to deflect a massive, life-threatening asteroid hurtling towards Earth in the future, according to scientists who tested the theory in the laboratory by blasting X-rays at a marble-sized "mock asteroid".
summary: Humanity could use a nuclear bomb to deflect a massive, life-threatening asteroid hurtling towards Earth in the future, according to scientists who tested the theory in the laboratory by blasting X-rays at a marble-sized "mock asteroid".

title: Will "Blow Your Country To Smithereens": Trump To Iran Amid Death Threats
content: Donald Trump said Wednesday Iran should be blown "to smithereens" if the Islamic Republic is involved in the harming of a US White House candidate or ex-president.
summary: Donald Trump said Wednesday Iran should be blown "to smithereens" if the Islamic Republic is involved in the harming of a US White House candidate or ex-president.

title: IMF Approves $7 Billion Loan To Support Pakistan's Economy
content: The board of the International Monetary Fund on Wednesday agreed to loan Pakistan $7 billion to bolster its faltering economy, approving a relief package that Islamabad has pledged would be the last from the Washington-based lender.
summary: The board of the International Monetary Fund on Wednesday agreed to loan Pakistan $7 billion to bolster its faltering economy, approving a relief package that Islamabad has pledged would be the last from the Washington-based lender.

title: US Announces $375 Million Aid Package For Ukraine
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken announced $375 million in military aid for Ukraine on Wednesday, in a package that includes munitions for HIMARS precision rocket launchers, cluster munitions and light tactical vehicles.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken announced $375 million in military aid for Ukraine on Wednesday, in a package that includes munitions for HIMARS precision rocket launchers, cluster munitions and light tactical vehicles.

title: Social Media Platform X To Request Service Restoration In Brazil Amid Row
content: Elon Musk's social media platform X will file documents requested by Brazil's Supreme Court and ask by this Monday that service be restored in the country, according to two people familiar with the situation.
summary: Elon Musk's social media platform X will file documents requested by Brazil's Supreme Court and ask by this Monday that service be restored in the country, according to two people familiar with the situation.

title: Canada PM Justin Trudeau Survives Vote Of No Confidence
content: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Wednesday survived a vote of no confidence, with 211 lawmakers opposing and 120 in favor, in the first major test of his minority Liberal government.
summary: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Wednesday survived a vote of no confidence, with 211 lawmakers opposing and 120 in favor, in the first major test of his minority Liberal government.

title: Kamala Harris And Trump Target Economy In Close US Election Battle
content: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump will on Wednesday lay out rival visions for the economy, the top issue for many US voters, ahead of the vice president's first major solo interview since entering the White House race.
summary: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump will on Wednesday lay out rival visions for the economy, the top issue for many US voters, ahead of the vice president's first major solo interview since entering the White House race.

title: Family, Bride, Domestic Help: The Toll Of Israeli Strikes On Lebanon
content: Israel says Monday's strikes targeted Hezbollah weapons. Lebanon's health ministry said the attacks left more than 550 people dead, including at least 50 children and 98 women, in Lebanon's bloodiest day since the end of the 1975-90 Civil War.
summary: Israel says Monday's strikes targeted Hezbollah weapons. Lebanon's health ministry said the attacks left more than 550 people dead, including at least 50 children and 98 women, in Lebanon's bloodiest day since the end of the 1975-90 Civil War.
